words.source: H1870 n.fs construct derek 'way, road, journey'; KJV 'journey', ESV 'a journey', NASB 'a journey'
H7969 num.ms construct sheloshet 'three'; KJV 'three', ESV 'three', NASB 'three'
H3117 n.mp yom 'day'; KJV 'days'', ESV 'days'', NASB 'days''
H3212 Qal impf. 1cp of יָלַךְ 'to go, walk'; KJV 'we will go', ESV 'we must go', NASB 'we will go'
H4057 prep. b- + art. + n.ms midbar 'wilderness, desert'; KJV 'into the wilderness', ESV 'into the wilderness', NASB 'into the wilderness'
H2076 conj. + Qal perf. 1cp of זָבַח 'to sacrifice'; KJV 'and sacrifice', ESV 'and sacrifice', NASB 'and sacrifice'
H3068 prep. l- + divine name; KJV 'unto the LORD', ESV 'to the LORD', NASB 'to the LORD'
H430 n.mp construct ʾelohim 'God' + 1cp suff.; KJV 'our God', ESV 'our God', NASB 'our God'
H834 prep. k- + rel. pron. ʾasher 'just as'; KJV 'as', ESV 'as', NASB 'as'
H559 Qal impf. 3ms of אָמַר 'to say'; KJV 'he shall command', ESV 'he tells', NASB 'He commands'
H413 prep. ʾel 'to' + 1cp suff.; KJV 'us', ESV 'us', NASB 'us'
